documentation.text: Join a game, the caller must pay the required entrance ticket amount in ETH

Join a queue in order to find an opponent to fight against
 -> Should emit a StartMatch event when an opponent is found

Encode the specified technique
 Should be used to generate a hashed value in order to commit secretly the player action for playMatch

Commit the player's action for his current match
 The action(Technique) must be hashed with a bytes32 key. so it can be saved with his hidden form.
 -> Should emit a MatchPlayed event when the last player of the Match commit his play

Reveal the player's action for his current match
 It is required to send the player's action with the key used to hash it previously for platMatch method
 -> Should emit a MatchEnd event when the last player of the Match reveal his play

The player decide to forfeit and quit the specified match
 No card will be used from either players
 -> Should emit a MatchEnd event

Withdraw gains from the Game
 send rewards to the the players if he meets the withdrawal conditions, do nothing otherwise

This method will check if your opponent didn't play yet
 If this method return true, you will be allowed to call skipAfkDuringPlay to pass the turn of your opponent and win the match

This method will check if your opponent didn't reveal his play yet
 If this method return true, you will be allowed to call skipAfkDuringReveal to pass the turn of your opponent and win the match
Kick your opponent from the match if conditions are met. You will win this match by default
Kick your opponent from the match if conditions are met. You will win this match by default
Get your profile stat for the current Game
Get the player profile stat for the current Game
Get the number of player alive in the game
Get the number of Guu from alive players
Get the number of Paa from alive players
Get the number of Chi from alive players

Encode the specified technique

encodeAction(address,uint8,bytes32).notice: Encode the specified technique Should be used to generate a hashed value in order to commit secretly the player action for playMatch

forfeitMatch(address).notice: The player decide to forfeit and quit the specified match No card will be used from either players -> Should emit a MatchEnd event

getPlayer(address).notice: Get the player profile stat for the current Game

getProfile().notice: Get your profile stat for the current Game

getTotalChi().notice: Get the number of Chi from alive players

getTotalGuu().notice: Get the number of Guu from alive players

getTotalPaa().notice: Get the number of Paa from alive players

getTotalPlayers().notice: Get the number of player alive in the game

joinGame().notice: Join a game, the caller must pay the required entrance ticket amount in ETH

joinMatch().notice: Join a queue in order to find an opponent to fight against -> Should emit a StartMatch event when an opponent is found

playMatch(bytes32,address).notice: Commit the player's action for his current match The action(Technique) must be hashed with a bytes32 key. so it can be saved with his hidden form. -> Should emit a MatchPlayed event when the last player of the Match commit his play

revealMatch(uint8,bytes32,address).notice: Reveal the player's action for his current match It is required to send the player's action with the key used to hash it previously for platMatch method -> Should emit a MatchEnd event when the last player of the Match reveal his play

skipAfkDuringPlay(address).notice: Kick your opponent from the match if conditions are met. You will win this match by default

skipAfkDuringReveal(address).notice: Kick your opponent from the match if conditions are met. You will win this match by default

waitingForOpponentToPlay(address).notice: This method will check if your opponent didn't play yet If this method return true, you will be allowed to call skipAfkDuringPlay to pass the turn of your opponent and win the match

waitingForOpponentToReveal(address).notice: This method will check if your opponent didn't reveal his play yet If this method return true, you will be allowed to call skipAfkDuringReveal to pass the turn of your opponent and win the match

withdrawGains().notice: Withdraw gains from the Game send rewards to the the players if he meets the withdrawal conditions, do nothing otherwise
